title: Need help posting pictures in a discussion page.
body: Hey, i was just making a post in the Alpha Client page and i have a few pictures i made that i want to put into the post so people can really see the ideas i'm trying to illustrate. So yeah help please.

replies.body: Upload the image to an image hosting site like imgur.com. Imgur should ocme up with a little panel that gives you various different links to the image, the imgur link or the permalink will work. Just put it in the post body and boards will automatically show it as an image when you post it :)
